- Non-Interactive due to authenticity warning ()
        a) https://stackoverflow.com/questions/28461713/how-to-ignore-or-pass-yes-when-the-authenticity-of-host-cant-be-established-i
                ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no "$user@$host"
                ~/.ssh/known_hosts
                echo "54.237.49.115" >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts

- run commands with sudo ansible (differnt AMI)


The authenticity of host '184.73.13.246 (184.73.13.246)' can't be established.
ECDSA key fingerprint is SHA256:8sB9UEHmmAex2aYo4mc5FcJakC0mQyYKFh7f/m2joOs.  
Are you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no/[fingerprint])? ^C [ERROR]: User interrupted execution

ssh-keyscan 54.237.49.115 >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts
